sentences.sContent: I’m always working under pressure to meet deadlines (= finish something on time ) .
sentences.sCn: 我总是在赶工期的压力下工作。

sentences.sContent: ...One recent change in college admissions is that selective colleges and universities have moved the traditional deadline to earlier dates...
...The deadline for applying to his favorite college was Nov...
...The recent trend toward early decision and early action among selective colleges and universities has pushed the traditional deadline of January up to Nov...

phrases.pCn: 赶上最后期限；按期完成

remMethod.val: dead(死) ＋ line(线) → 死期 → 最后期限

trans.tranOther: a date or time by which you have to do or complete something
